emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group of young boys and girls holding basketballs, footballs, fishing rods, and board games, gathered on field in South Park for the annual Pittsburgh Courier Newsboys' Picnic
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 2, 1961, pg. 20 reads: "Outstanding Newsboys And Girls win top awards of rods and reels, basketballs, footballs, games and other prizes."
